mainUIElements.panelText: Open an image file to see info...

openImage.title: Select an image that you want to open...

openDir.title: Select a folder that you want to open...

aboutWindow.title: About
aboutWindow.description: **AscentViewer** is an image viewer written in [**Python**](https://www.python.org/), based on [**PyQt**](https://riverbankcomputing.com/software/pyqt/) and several other libraries.

resetConfigDialog.title: Resetting configuration
resetConfigDialog.mainText: Are you sure that you want to reset the configuration?
resetConfigDialog.informativeText: This will also prevent the configuration from being saved for this session.

exitDialog.title: Exiting AscentViewer
exitDialog.mainText: Are you sure you want to exit AscentViewer?
exitDialog.informativeText: By the way, thank you for using this program!
